segments.text: Are you ready to order now , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , let me have this roast beef special .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a choice of vegetables , green peas , lima beans or spinach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will have the green peas and make sure the beef is well done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . What would you want to drink , coffee , tea or milk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A cup of coffee , please , with cream and sugar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cream and sugar are on the table , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to order some dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ice cream , fresh fruit or chocolate cake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I will have a dish of Vanilla ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Waiter , may I have my check , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are , sir . Pay the cashier at the door .
segments.speaker: S1
